casename: Lau Liat Meng & Co v Lum Kai Keng
counsel: Andre Arul (C Arul & Partners) for the applicant; Wong Siew Hong (Infinitus Law Corp) for the respondent; Lau Liat Meng in attendance
tags-parsed: Civil Procedure/Costs/Interim bill/Nature of such bill/Whether proper for lawyer to submit such bill and reserve right to present further bill covering the same period/Duty of lawyer to draw up bill clearly and accurately
